title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-14] [$250] Chat - Duplicate Sound When Submitting an Expense
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Navigate to FAB > Submit Expense
2. Add an amount and choose a workspace
3. Add a merchant and submit the expense
4. The issue also occurs when assigning a task

Expected result: Only one sound should play when submitting an expense, similar to when sending an attachment

Actual result: None
